Ow ithin sil gannawa kiyala koranne ammandila tika opa dupa kiyawamin indala ena ekaney. Ithin oya roopa kayak idiripitama thiyenawane kaiya gahanna. Muhunath thahaduwa saha anga patha diha balapuwama hondata penenawa koitharam klesha duru karalada inne kiyala.Un okkoma ekai. Mokada koranna puluwan dewal ye koranna kiyala thiyenne.

Monks or robed lay persons? Which of these do (or did) these people possess ?? Patimokkha Sila -- The Fundamental Moral Code (major offenses related to immoral, cruel, harmful and selfish activities.) Indriyasamvara Sila -- Morality pertaining to sense-restraint. Ajivaparisuddhi Sila -- Morality pertaining to purity of livelihood. Paccayasannissita Sila -- Morality pertaining to the use of requisites pertaining to life. It's a very dangerous game these people are playing...

More than they been robed lay persons they are rogues. 98% are that. This is readily evident when one observes them interacting with society in dealing with authorities. They consider there attire as a passport to say anything or do anything. They instigate the common masses to follow them where ever they lead using the religion as a cover. Fools not knowing what is happening with what they call shraddawa continues the path shown to them. That is why Sri-Lanka is in this state whereas all other countries which received independence almost together with us have over taken us in so many positive ways.
Loku loku bara bara wachana dapuwama shape kiyala thama hithanne. Owa kiyana ekawath danne nehe monawada kiyanne kiyala. Ehema nethuwa mehema wevida ?
Monada oy kunuharupa liyanne. Pacaya sansita sila ? Kohenda eka thiyenne ? Redda asseda ?
